name: ANATHEMA (itch) (prophet goddess)
description:
A very unfinished first-person shooter made for 7DFPS and Procjam. 

Updates forthcoming, featuring things like: gameplay! graphical improvements! more content! Consider this a tech demo, or a portent of things to come.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Left Mouse: Shoot

Right Mouse: Grappling Hook

Left Control: Place Bomb

C: Crouch

Made by:

  • Cassandra Lugo (Design, Music, Programming)
  • Rose (Art)
  • Evan Hemsley "Cosmonaut" (Programming)

With:

  • FNA
  • Encompass
  • Bullet

Sounds: 

"Bomb - Small" by Zangrutz

"fuse2.wav" by j1987
